ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the duration of the
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the duration of the procedure interruption?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record how long the procedure was interrupted before it resumed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPPR.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTM variable. Concatenate the CDASH fields for collected PRTRT interruption duration and the unit components and create PRITRPD using ISO 8601 Period format. The information could be submitted in an SUPPPR dataset as the value of SUPPPR.QVAL where SUPPPR.QNAM = "PRITRPD" and SUPPPR.QLABEL = "Collected Interruption Duration". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This field is used to collect the duration of procedure interruption. In some situations, the duration of the interruption may not be collected but calculated from the procedure start and end times recorded elsewhere in the CRF. This derived variable is not included in an SDTM-based dataset.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Total number of days Radiation Therapy was interrupted:
